Text:
damn. just re-bought this cd after i lost the one i got on release day. didnt see this record up for download often. surprised to see it on bittorrent, even more surprised to see it coming from spagna himself :) damn. this really is the anti-rock revolution. 

(PS bro ill pay big $$$ for the original demo that came before shakedown. not kidding. hope shits going well with your new bands)
